author: sussman
msg: Allow design doc to build again.

author: sussman
msg: Revamping the organization of the doc/ directory.  Take a look-see in
As a rule, each texinfo document needs to be isolated in its own
directory (since each doc typically consists of multiple .texi files
and leaves a mess when compiling.)  The Right solution for building
docs is to be able to describe them in our top-level build.conf.  But
for now, we'll just enable our "design" doc to build directly.
